titles.title: If That Same Spirit That Raised Christ From The Dead

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If that same Spirit that raised Christ from the dead
Dwells in you, dwells in you
If that same Spirit that raised Christ from the dead
Dwells in you, dwells in you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He shall quicken your mortal bodies
If that Spirit dwells in you
He shall quicken your mortal bodies
If that same Spirit dwells in you.
